hooks.command: bash -c 'FILE="$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH"; if [[ "$FILE" == *.ts || "$FILE" == *.tsx ]]; then echo "[hook] Type-checking $FILE..."; npx tsc --noEmit --pretty 2>&1 | head -20; fi'
bash -c 'FILE="$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH"; if [[ "$FILE" == *.ts || "$FILE" == *.tsx ]]; then echo "[hook] Type-checking $FILE..."; npx tsc --noEmit --pretty 2>&1 | head -20; fi'
